attributes.review: Tried to download. Took too long to download. Once it actually did download it would stop working. Exit out of the app. Now it’s effecting the rest of me phone. 0/10 would NEVER DOWNLOAD AGAIN
attributes.title: CANNOT BELIEVE THIS

attributes.review: took SO LONG to download. i was just trying to download to support my president 💞 and when it did download when i opened the app my phone crashed !!! 😡😡😡😡
attributes.title: do not recommend

attributes.review: this app WILL ruin your phone! as a trump-lover, i wanted to download this app to give my ever growing love and support for T-dog but my phone got DESTROYED. i do not recommend downloading this app, and it breaks my heart that mr. trump would allow this app to stay on the app store <\3
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: I would like to start of that this app has been loading ever since I downloaded the app and told me to shut up so now I just went to eat cereal!!!!!!!!
attributes.title: Give a 1 star!!!!

attributes.review: This app literally took 4 days just to download and when it finally did my entire phone crashed and I lost all my files!!! I was just finishing the touches to my soundcloud rap too!!🤢😭
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE

attributes.review: This app not only took days to download but also messed with my phone!! Do Not Download!! I was just hoping to support the 2020 elections but ended up needing to get my phone fixed! Such a disappointment! 🤢🤢
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: I would not recommend this app to anyone. I was so excited to support my orange president, but his app does not share the same deep love I have for him. In fact it made my phone explode. I want a full refund.
attributes.title: Bad APPle

attributes.review: took a whopping 18 hours to download, and when it finally did and I opened it, it was just trump screaming obscenities at me for 5 minutes straight. Would not recommend
attributes.title: bad

attributes.review: This has got to be the greatest app on the face of the earth hands down
attributes.title: BEST APP EVER

attributes.review: This app immediately asks for my SSN!! As a republican I cannot understand why our fantastic president would try to promote such a system as socialism. It’s disgusting. We deserve fascist ruling through capitalism not these shenanigans.
attributes.title: Terrible
